summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of B1 Macro Data Platform (dxy-macro-core). All 6 required API endpoints working correctly with 100% test pass rate.
passed_tests: GET /api/dxy-macro-core/series - 7 series loaded with coverageYears >= 40 (all series have 40+ years)
GET /api/dxy-macro-core/context?seriesId=FEDFUNDS - returns current, deltas, trend, regime, pressure
GET /api/dxy-macro-core/history?seriesId=T10Y2Y - returns points array with 12,428 historical points
Error handling - invalid series (404) and missing parameters (400) properly handled
